Caption: Prof. P.C. Varghese addresses the audience.  On the dais from left Mr. Lionel Paul (Gymkhana General Secretary), Prof. Rouve, Mr. R. Natarajan (Registrar), Mr. M. Bhaktavatsalam (Chief Minister, Madras and Chief Guest), Dr. A.L. Mudaliar (Chairman, Board of Governors), Prof. B. Sengupto (Director) and student representative.
